column5: Went from Michigan to Windsor Ontario casino today and exchanged American for Canadian for our trip to Nakina Canada in 3 days. good news is got 104 Canadian for 100 us bad news dropped 340 on the slots. Hmm could have bought all all new shamano reels for the trip. O but its OK its was for the fishing trip I live for every year!!! Yuk yuk Hopping for another fantastic trip 23 years running...........Halfmoon
